author: rhuijben
msg: (merge_file): Fix issue #3842, by installing from the pristine store instead
of from a temporary copy when the file is unmodified.

msg: - OODT-155: Rewrite File Manager Browser webapp using Apache Wicket: refactor and add some generic methods and a generic FMBrowserApp class that sub-classes can inherit

author: pete
msg: replace occurrences of unix long timestamps and java.util.Date, mostly in date header processing parts and last modification code for wicket's resources

msg: - OODT-155: Rewrite File Manager Browser webapp using Apache Wicket: refactor and add some generic methods and a generic FMBrowserApp class that sub-classes can inherit

author: rhuijben
msg: When we update a text file from the update editor, but don't install a new file
we should keep its recorded size and time or the performance of svn status
suffers. This handles a case identified by looking into issue #3842, but not
(close_file): Ask svn_wc__db_base_add_file to keep the recorded information
when we don't install a new file.
(insert_base_node): If necessary copy the recorded information from a
